name: Snake (itch) (ShadowCube)
description:
This is version 0.3.0 of my first proper game that I've actually been able to publish made using the Godot game engine

Goal of the game:

Collect the coins and grow as long as possible without colliding with your body

If you collide with your body you die and the level gets reset

Controls:

1: Move using WASD or Arrow Keys

2: Quit the game by pressing the Escape key

Currently Implemented Features and Mechanics:

1: Snake that can move using WASD or Arrow keys

2: Snake can go off the screen and it will come back on screen on the other side of the screen

3: Random Snake and coin spawn locations

4: Snake can collect coins and it'll grow

5: Snake dies if it collides with itself

6: 800x800 game window size (May be able to allow players to change the window size in the future)

7: Quit the game by pressing Escape

8:  Score Tracker with UI in game

9: Sound Effects and Music

Planned Features and Mechanics:

1: Main Menu

2: Leaderboard (Potentially)

3:  A bunch of ideas for new game modes to make this game unique compared to the original snake game that I will not reveal until I've thought them out a bit more

4: Pause Menu

5: Potential Multiplayer sometime in the future

If anyone has any ideas of features they'd like to see in this game or if anyone experiences any bugs then leave a comment and let me know and I'll try and patch it before the next release of the game

Thank you for your time and if you want to help me out to be able to work on this game and many more future games then you could always donate some money to me you don't have to but it would help me to work more on this game and my future as a game developer

Hope you enjoy the game

Cube
